How To: Install

  1. Get all the required components specified in the System Requirements.
  2. Install AMD APP Profiler using one of the following methods:
    • For Windows:
      • Through the AMD APP SDK installation, select the AMD APP Profiler as one of the components to be installed, or
      • Run the package AMDAPPProfiler-vx.x.x.msi.
        Follow the installation instructions.
    • For Linux:
      • AMD APP Profiler will be installed automatically as part of the AMD SDK installation, or
      • Extract the package AMDAPPProfiler-vx.x.x-lnx.tgz using tar -xvzf command.
The profiler package is included with the AMD APP SDK package, but also available as a separate download from the product webpage.
